section.heading: Construction and application.
section.text: This chapter must be construed and applied:

para.text: To facilitate electronic transactions consistent with other applicable law;
To be consistent with reasonable practices concerning electronic transactions and with the continued expansion of those practices; and
To effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among states enacting it.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 15-105 validated previously made technical corrections.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 3202(b) of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Electronic Transactions Act (1999 Act).
